title: FR Carre Opera Scraper Input Configuration

startUrls.description: Initial URLs to start crawling from.

maxDepth.description: Maximum link depth for the crawler.

maxPages.description: Maximum number of pages to scrape in a single run.

sameDomainOnly.description: If true, restricts crawling to the domains of the start URLs.

allowedDomains.description: Optional explicit whitelist of allowed hostnames.

outputFile.description: Path to the JSON file where scraped data will be saved.

delayMs.description: Delay in milliseconds between requests, for politeness.
